description:
Zoro uses Usopp as a decoy in his battle with the beasts, and Nami discovers the secret that could be the key to survival in her brawl with the bathing beauty!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 5人のナミ? 反撃は蜃気楼とともに!
Cinq Nami ? La contre-attaque des mirages
Five Namis? Nami Strikes Back with Mirages!
Gonin no Nami? Hangeki wa Shinkirou to Tomo ni!
Пять Нами! Контратака вместе с миражом!
